ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Druzzil Ro Migration Update
ygData.msgSnippet: True.  I m aware of that feature and in fact was using it last night to PS two (sometimes three *gulp*) frogs at a time.  Resists make it dangerous enough to
ygData.messageBody:
True. I'm aware of that feature and in fact was using it last night to PS
two (sometimes three *gulp*) frogs at a time. Resists make it dangerous
enough to be fun. *shrug* I just assumed the SK would root the damn frog,
y'know? If he'd said OOM I would have done something different. Lack of
communication kills, no two ways about it.

[47 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

<snip>
> Anyways, here's a tip with Pixie Strike. Once you target a
> mob and start a targeted song, you don't have to keep it
> targeted. You can switch to a different target, attack,
> etc. and the Pixie Strike will still hit the mob you had
> targeted when you started the song.
<snip>
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
